37 // Qt
38 #include <QApplication>
39 #include <QLabel>
40 #include <QList>

66 const std::string SETUP_ASSISTANT_FILE = ".setup_assistant";

68 // ******************************************************************************************
69 // Outer User Interface for MoveIt Configuration Assistant
70 // ******************************************************************************************
71 ConfigurationFilesWidget::ConfigurationFilesWidget(QWidget* parent, const MoveItConfigDataPtr& config_data)
72  : SetupScreenWidget(parent), config_data_(config_data), has_generated_pkg_(false), first_focusGiven_(true)
73 {
74  // Basic widget container
75  QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout();
76 
77  // Top Header Area ------------------------------------------------
78 
79  HeaderWidget* header =
80  new HeaderWidget("Generate Configuration Files",
81  "Create or update the configuration files package needed to run your robot with MoveIt. Uncheck "
82  "files to disable them from being generated - this is useful if you have made custom changes to "
83  "them. Files in orange have been automatically detected as changed.",
84  this);
85  layout->addWidget(header);
86 
87  // Path Widget ----------------------------------------------------
88 
89  // Stack Path Dialog
90  stack_path_ = new LoadPathWidget("Configuration Package Save Path",
91  "Specify the desired directory for the MoveIt configuration package to be "
92  "generated. Overwriting an existing configuration package directory is acceptable. "
93  "Example: <i>/u/robot/ros/panda_moveit_config</i>",
94  this, true); // is directory
95  layout->addWidget(stack_path_);
96 
97  // Pass the package path from start screen to configuration files screen
98  stack_path_->setPath(config_data_->config_pkg_path_);
99 
100  // Generated Files List -------------------------------------------
101  QLabel* generated_list = new QLabel("Files to be generated: (checked)", this);
102  layout->addWidget(generated_list);
103 
104  QSplitter* splitter = new QSplitter(Qt::Horizontal, this);
105  splitter->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
106 
107  // List Box
108  action_list_ = new QListWidget(this);
109  action_list_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
110  connect(action_list_, SIGNAL(currentRowChanged(int)), this, SLOT(changeActionDesc(int)));
111 
112  // Description
113  action_label_ = new QLabel(this);
114  action_label_->setFrameShape(QFrame::StyledPanel);
115  action_label_->setFrameShadow(QFrame::Raised);
116  action_label_->setLineWidth(1);
117  action_label_->setMidLineWidth(0);
118  action_label_->setWordWrap(true);
119  action_label_->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Preferred, QSizePolicy::Expanding);
120  action_label_->setMinimumWidth(100);
121  action_label_->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
122  action_label_->setOpenExternalLinks(true); // open with web browser
123 
124  // Add to splitter
125  splitter->addWidget(action_list_);
126  splitter->addWidget(action_label_);
127 
128  // Add Layout
129  layout->addWidget(splitter);
130 
131  // Progress bar and generate buttons ---------------------------------------------------
132  QHBoxLayout* hlayout1 = new QHBoxLayout();
133 
134  // Progress Bar
135  progress_bar_ = new QProgressBar(this);
136  progress_bar_->setMaximum(100);
137  progress_bar_->setMinimum(0);
138  hlayout1->addWidget(progress_bar_);
139  // hlayout1->setContentsMargins( 20, 30, 20, 30 );
140 
141  // Generate Package Button
142  btn_save_ = new QPushButton("&Generate Package", this);
143  // btn_save_->setMinimumWidth(180);
144  btn_save_->setMinimumHeight(40);
145  connect(btn_save_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(savePackage()));
146  hlayout1->addWidget(btn_save_);
147 
148  // Add Layout
149  layout->addLayout(hlayout1);
150 
151  // Bottom row --------------------------------------------------
152 
153  QHBoxLayout* hlayout3 = new QHBoxLayout();
154 
155  // Success label
156  success_label_ = new QLabel(this);
157  QFont success_label_font(QFont().defaultFamily(), 12, QFont::Bold);
158  success_label_->setFont(success_label_font);
159  success_label_->hide(); // only show once the files have been generated
160  success_label_->setText("Configuration package generated successfully!");
161  hlayout3->addWidget(success_label_);
162  hlayout3->setAlignment(success_label_, Qt::AlignRight);
163 
164  // Exit button
165  QPushButton* btn_exit = new QPushButton("E&xit Setup Assistant", this);
166  btn_exit->setMinimumWidth(180);
167  connect(btn_exit, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(exitSetupAssistant()));
168  hlayout3->addWidget(btn_exit);
169  hlayout3->setAlignment(btn_exit, Qt::AlignRight);
170 
171  layout->addLayout(hlayout3);
172 
173  // Finish Layout --------------------------------------------------
174  this->setLayout(layout);
175 }
176 
177 // ******************************************************************************************
178 // Populate the 'Files to be generated' list
179 // ******************************************************************************************
180 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::loadGenFiles()
181 {
182  GenerateFile file; // re-used
183  std::string template_path; // re-used
184  const std::string robot_name = config_data_->srdf_->robot_name_;
185 
186  gen_files_.clear(); // reset vector
187 
188  // Get template package location ----------------------------------------------------------------------
189  fs::path template_package_path = config_data_->setup_assistant_path_;
190  template_package_path /= "templates";
191  template_package_path /= "moveit_config_pkg_template";
192  config_data_->template_package_path_ = template_package_path.make_preferred().string();
193 
194  if (!fs::is_directory(config_data_->template_package_path_))
195  {
196  QMessageBox::critical(
197  this, "Error Generating",
198  QString("Unable to find package template directory: ").append(config_data_->template_package_path_.c_str()));
199  return false;
200  }
201 
202  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
203  // ROS PACKAGE FILES AND FOLDERS ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
204  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
205 
206  // package.xml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
207  // Note: we call the file package.xml.template so that it isn't automatically indexed by rosprofile
208  // in the scenario where we want to disabled the setup_assistant by renaming its root package.xml
209  file.file_name_ = "package.xml";
210  file.rel_path_ = file.file_name_;
211  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->template_package_path_, "package.xml.template");
212  file.description_ = "Defines a ROS package";
213  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
214  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::AUTHOR_INFO;
215  gen_files_.push_back(file);
216 
217  // CMakeLists.txt --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
218  file.file_name_ = "CMakeLists.txt";
219  file.rel_path_ = file.file_name_;
220  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->template_package_path_, file.file_name_);
221  file.description_ = "CMake build system configuration file";
222  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
223  file.write_on_changes = 0;
224  gen_files_.push_back(file);
225 
226  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
227  // CONIG FILES -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
228  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
229  std::string config_path = "config";
230 
231  // config/ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
232  file.file_name_ = "config/";
233  file.rel_path_ = file.file_name_;
234  file.description_ = "Folder containing all MoveIt configuration files for your robot. This folder is required and "
235  "cannot be disabled.";
236  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::createFolder, this, _1);
237  file.write_on_changes = 0;
238  gen_files_.push_back(file);
239 
240  // robot.srdf ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
241  file.file_name_ = config_data_->srdf_pkg_relative_path_.empty() ? config_data_->urdf_model_->getName() + ".srdf" :
242  config_data_->srdf_pkg_relative_path_;
243  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->srdf_pkg_relative_path_.empty() ?
244  config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_) :
245  config_data_->srdf_pkg_relative_path_;
246  file.description_ = "SRDF (<a href='http://www.ros.org/wiki/srdf'>Semantic Robot Description Format</a>) is a "
247  "representation of semantic information about robots. This format is intended to represent "
248  "information about the robot that is not in the URDF file, but it is useful for a variety of "
249  "applications. The intention is to include information that has a semantic aspect to it.";
250  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&srdf::SRDFWriter::writeSRDF, config_data_->srdf_, _1);
251  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::SRDF;
252  gen_files_.push_back(file);
253  // special step required so the generated .setup_assistant yaml has this value
254  config_data_->srdf_pkg_relative_path_ = file.rel_path_;
255 
256  // ompl_planning.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
257  file.file_name_ = "ompl_planning.yaml";
258  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
259  file.description_ = "Configures the OMPL (<a href='http://ompl.kavrakilab.org/'>Open Motion Planning Library</a>) "
260  "planning plugin. For every planning group defined in the SRDF, a number of planning "
261  "configurations are specified (under planner_configs). Additionally, default settings for the "
262  "state space to plan in for a particular group can be specified, such as the collision checking "
263  "resolution. Each planning configuration specified for a group must be defined under the "
264  "planner_configs tag. While defining a planner configuration, the only mandatory parameter is "
265  "'type', which is the name of the motion planner to be used. Any other planner-specific "
266  "parameters can be defined but are optional.";
267  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputOMPLPlanningYAML, config_data_, _1);
268  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS;
269  gen_files_.push_back(file);
270 
271  // chomp_planning.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
272  file.file_name_ = "chomp_planning.yaml";
273  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
274  file.description_ = "Specifies which chomp planning plugin parameters to be used for the CHOMP planner";
275  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputCHOMPPlanningYAML, config_data_, _1);
276  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS; // need to double check if this is actually correct!
277  gen_files_.push_back(file);
278 
279  // kinematics.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
280  file.file_name_ = "kinematics.yaml";
281  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
282  file.description_ = "Specifies which kinematic solver plugin to use for each planning group in the SRDF, as well as "
283  "the kinematic solver search resolution.";
284  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputKinematicsYAML, config_data_, _1);
285  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS | MoveItConfigData::GROUP_KINEMATICS;
286  gen_files_.push_back(file);
287 
288  // joint_limits.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
289  file.file_name_ = "joint_limits.yaml";
290  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
291  file.description_ = "Contains additional information about joints that appear in your planning groups that is not "
292  "contained in the URDF, as well as allowing you to set maximum and minimum limits for velocity "
293  "and acceleration than those contained in your URDF. This information is used by our trajectory "
294  "filtering system to assign reasonable velocities and timing for the trajectory before it is "
295  "passed to the robots controllers.";
296  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputJointLimitsYAML, config_data_, _1);
297  file.write_on_changes = 0; // Can they be changed?
298  gen_files_.push_back(file);
299 
300  // cartesian_limits.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
301  file.file_name_ = "cartesian_limits.yaml";
302  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
303  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->template_package_path_, file.rel_path_);
304  file.description_ = "Cartesian velocity for planning in the workspace."
305  "The velocity is used by pilz industrial motion planner as maximum velocity for cartesian "
306  "planning requests scaled by the velocity scaling factor of an individual planning request.";
307  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
308  file.write_on_changes = 0; // Can they be changed?
309  gen_files_.push_back(file);
310 
311  // fake_controllers.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
312  file.file_name_ = "fake_controllers.yaml";
313  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
314  file.description_ = "Creates dummy configurations for controllers that correspond to defined groups. This is mostly "
315  "useful for testing.";
316  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputFakeControllersYAML, config_data_, _1);
317  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS;
318  gen_files_.push_back(file);
319 
320  // ros_controllers.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
321  file.file_name_ = "ros_controllers.yaml";
322  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
323  file.description_ = "Creates configurations for ros_controllers.";
324  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputROSControllersYAML, config_data_, _1);
325  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS;
326  gen_files_.push_back(file);
327 
328  // sensors_3d.yaml --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
329  file.file_name_ = "sensors_3d.yaml";
330  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(config_path, file.file_name_);
331  file.description_ = "Creates configurations 3d sensors.";
332  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::output3DSensorPluginYAML, config_data_, _1);
333  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::SENSORS_CONFIG;
334  gen_files_.push_back(file);
335 
336  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
337  // LAUNCH FILES ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
338  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
339  std::string launch_path = "launch";
340  const std::string template_launch_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->template_package_path_, launch_path);
341 
342  // launch/ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
343  file.file_name_ = "launch/";
344  file.rel_path_ = file.file_name_;
345  file.description_ = "Folder containing all MoveIt launch files for your robot. "
346  "This folder is required and cannot be disabled.";
347  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::createFolder, this, _1);
348  file.write_on_changes = 0;
349  gen_files_.push_back(file);
350 
351  // move_group.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
352  file.file_name_ = "move_group.launch";
353  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
354  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
355  file.description_ = "Launches the move_group node that provides the MoveGroup action and other parameters <a "
356  "href='http://moveit.ros.org/doxygen/"
357  "classmoveit_1_1planning__interface_1_1MoveGroup.html#details'>MoveGroup action</a>";
358  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
359  file.write_on_changes = 0;
360  gen_files_.push_back(file);
361 
362  // planning_context.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
363  file.file_name_ = "planning_context.launch";
364  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
365  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
366  file.description_ = "Loads settings for the ROS parameter server, required for running MoveIt. This includes the "
367  "SRDF, joints_limits.yaml file, ompl_planning.yaml file, optionally the URDF, etc";
368  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
369  file.write_on_changes = 0;
370  gen_files_.push_back(file);
371 
372  // moveit_rviz.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
373  file.file_name_ = "moveit_rviz.launch";
374  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
375  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
376  file.description_ = "Visualize in Rviz the robot's planning groups running with interactive markers that allow goal "
377  "states to be set.";
378  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
379  file.write_on_changes = 0;
380  gen_files_.push_back(file);
381 
382  // ompl_planning_pipeline.launch
383  // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
384  file.file_name_ = "ompl_planning_pipeline.launch.xml";
385  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
386  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
387  file.description_ = "Intended to be included in other launch files that require the OMPL planning plugin. Defines "
388  "the proper plugin name on the parameter server and a default selection of planning request "
389  "adapters.";
390  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
391  file.write_on_changes = 0;
392  gen_files_.push_back(file);
393 
394  // pilz_industrial_motion_planner_planning_pipeline.launch
395  // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
396  file.file_name_ = "pilz_industrial_motion_planner_planning_pipeline.launch.xml";
397  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
398  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
399  file.description_ = "Intended to be included in other launch files that require the Pilz industrial motion planner "
400  "planning plugin. Defines the proper plugin name on the parameter server and a default selection "
401  "of planning request adapters.";
402  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
403  file.write_on_changes = 0;
404  gen_files_.push_back(file);
405 
406  // chomp_planning_pipeline.launch
407  // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
408  file.file_name_ = "chomp_planning_pipeline.launch.xml";
409  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
410  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
411  file.description_ = "Intended to be included in other launch files that require the CHOMP planning plugin. Defines "
412  "the proper plugin name on the parameter server and a default selection of planning request "
413  "adapters.";
414  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
415  file.write_on_changes = 0;
416  gen_files_.push_back(file);
417 
418  // planning_pipeline.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
419  file.file_name_ = "planning_pipeline.launch.xml";
420  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
421  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
422  file.description_ = "Helper launch file that can choose between different planning pipelines to be loaded.";
423  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
424  file.write_on_changes = 0;
425  gen_files_.push_back(file);
426 
427  // warehouse_settings.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
428  file.file_name_ = "warehouse_settings.launch.xml";
429  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
430  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
431  file.description_ = "Helper launch file that specifies default settings for MongoDB.";
432  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
433  file.write_on_changes = 0;
434  gen_files_.push_back(file);
435 
436  // warehouse.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
437  file.file_name_ = "warehouse.launch";
438  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
439  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
440  file.description_ = "Launch file for starting MongoDB.";
441  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
442  file.write_on_changes = 0;
443  gen_files_.push_back(file);
444 
445  // default_warehouse_db.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
446  file.file_name_ = "default_warehouse_db.launch";
447  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
448  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
449  file.description_ = "Launch file for starting the warehouse with a default MongoDB.";
450  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
451  file.write_on_changes = 0;
452  gen_files_.push_back(file);
453 
454  // run_benchmark_ompl.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
455  file.file_name_ = "run_benchmark_ompl.launch";
456  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
457  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
458  file.description_ = "Launch file for benchmarking OMPL planners";
459  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
460  file.write_on_changes = 0;
461  gen_files_.push_back(file);
462 
463  // sensor_manager.launch --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
464  file.file_name_ = "sensor_manager.launch.xml";
465  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
466  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
467  file.description_ = "Helper launch file that can choose between different sensor managers to be loaded.";
468  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
469  file.write_on_changes = 0;
470  gen_files_.push_back(file);
471 
472  // robot_moveit_controller_manager.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
473  file.file_name_ = robot_name + "_moveit_controller_manager.launch.xml";
474  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
475  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, "moveit_controller_manager.launch.xml");
476  file.description_ = "Placeholder for settings specific to the MoveIt controller manager implemented for you robot.";
477  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
478  file.write_on_changes = 0;
479  gen_files_.push_back(file);
480 
481  // robot_moveit_sensor_manager.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
482  file.file_name_ = robot_name + "_moveit_sensor_manager.launch.xml";
483  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
484  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, "moveit_sensor_manager.launch.xml");
485  file.description_ = "Placeholder for settings specific to the MoveIt sensor manager implemented for you robot.";
486  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
487  file.write_on_changes = 0;
488  gen_files_.push_back(file);
489 
490  // trajectory_execution.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
491  file.file_name_ = "trajectory_execution.launch.xml";
492  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
493  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
494  file.description_ = "Loads settings for the ROS parameter server required for executing trajectories using the "
495  "trajectory_execution_manager::TrajectoryExecutionManager.";
496  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
497  file.write_on_changes = 0;
498  gen_files_.push_back(
499  file); // trajectory_execution.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
500 
501  file.file_name_ = "fake_moveit_controller_manager.launch.xml";
502  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
503  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
504  file.description_ = "Loads a fake controller plugin.";
505  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
506  file.write_on_changes = 0;
507  gen_files_.push_back(file);
508 
509  // demo.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
510  file.file_name_ = "demo.launch";
511  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
512  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
513  file.description_ = "Run a demo of MoveIt.";
514  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
515  file.write_on_changes = 0;
516  gen_files_.push_back(file);
517 
518  // gazebo.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
519  file.file_name_ = "gazebo.launch";
520  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
521  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, "gazebo.launch");
522  file.description_ = "Gazebo launch file which also launches ros_controllers and sends robot urdf to param server, "
523  "then using gazebo_ros pkg the robot is spawned to Gazebo";
524  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
525  gen_files_.push_back(file);
526 
527  // demo_gazebo.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
528  file.file_name_ = "demo_gazebo.launch";
529  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
530  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
531  file.description_ = "Run a demo of MoveIt with Gazebo and Rviz";
532  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
533  file.write_on_changes = 0;
534  gen_files_.push_back(file);
535 
536  // joystick_control.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
537  file.file_name_ = "joystick_control.launch";
538  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
539  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, file.file_name_);
540  file.description_ = "Control the Rviz Motion Planning Plugin with a joystick";
541  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
542  file.write_on_changes = 0;
543  gen_files_.push_back(file);
544 
545  // setup_assistant.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
546  file.file_name_ = "setup_assistant.launch";
547  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
548  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(
549  template_launch_path, "edit_configuration_package.launch"); // named this so that this launch file is not mixed
550  // up with the SA's real launch file
551  file.description_ = "Launch file for easily re-starting the MoveIt Setup Assistant to edit this robot's generated "
552  "configuration package.";
553  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
554  file.write_on_changes = 0;
555  gen_files_.push_back(file);
556 
557  // ros_controllers.launch ------------------------------------------------------------------
558  file.file_name_ = "ros_controllers.launch";
559  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
560  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, "ros_controllers.launch");
561  file.description_ = "ros_controllers launch file";
562  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
563  file.write_on_changes = MoveItConfigData::GROUPS;
564  gen_files_.push_back(file);
565 
566  // moveit.rviz ------------------------------------------------------------------
567  file.file_name_ = "moveit.rviz";
568  file.rel_path_ = config_data_->appendPaths(launch_path, file.file_name_);
569  template_path = config_data_->appendPaths(template_launch_path, "moveit.rviz");
570  file.description_ = "Configuration file for Rviz with the Motion Planning Plugin already setup. Used by passing "
571  "roslaunch moveit_rviz.launch config:=true";
572  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate, this, template_path, _1);
573  file.write_on_changes = 0;
574  gen_files_.push_back(file);
575 
576  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
577  // OTHER FILES -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
578  // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
579 
580  // .setup_assistant ------------------------------------------------------------------
581  file.file_name_ = SETUP_ASSISTANT_FILE;
582  file.rel_path_ = file.file_name_;
583  file.description_ = "MoveIt Setup Assistant's hidden settings file. You should not need to edit this file.";
584  file.gen_func_ = boost::bind(&MoveItConfigData::outputSetupAssistantFile, config_data_, _1);
585  file.write_on_changes = -1; // write on any changes
586  gen_files_.push_back(file);
587 
588  return true;
589 }
590 
591 // ******************************************************************************************
592 // Verify with user if certain screens have not been completed
593 // ******************************************************************************************
594 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::checkDependencies()
595 {
596  QStringList dependencies;
597  bool required_actions = false;
598 
599  // Check that at least 1 planning group exists
600  if (config_data_->srdf_->groups_.empty())
601  {
602  dependencies << "No robot model planning groups have been created";
603  }
604 
605  // Check that at least 1 link pair is disabled from collision checking
606  if (config_data_->srdf_->disabled_collisions_.empty())
607  {
608  dependencies << "No self-collisions have been disabled";
609  }
610 
611  // Check that there is at least 1 end effector added
612  if (config_data_->srdf_->end_effectors_.empty())
613  {
614  dependencies << "No end effectors have been added";
615  }
616 
617  // Check that there is at least 1 virtual joint added
618  if (config_data_->srdf_->virtual_joints_.empty())
619  {
620  dependencies << "No virtual joints have been added";
621  }
622 
623  // Check that there is a author name
624  if (config_data_->author_name_.find_first_not_of(' ') == std::string::npos)
625  {
626  // There is no name or it consists of whitespaces only
627  dependencies << "<b>No author name added</b>";
628  required_actions = true;
629  }
630 
631  // Check that email information is filled
632  QRegExp mail_regex("\\b[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z]{2,4}\\b");
633  mail_regex.setCaseSensitivity(Qt::CaseInsensitive);
634  mail_regex.setPatternSyntax(QRegExp::RegExp);
635  QString test_email = QString::fromStdString(config_data_->author_email_);
636  if (!mail_regex.exactMatch(test_email))
637  {
638  dependencies << "<b>No valid email address added</b>";
639  required_actions = true;
640  }
641 
642  // Display all accumumlated errors:
643  if (!dependencies.empty())
644  {
645  // Create a dependency message
646  QString dep_message;
647  if (!required_actions)
648  {
649  dep_message = "Some setup steps have not been completed. None of the steps are required, but here is a reminder "
650  "of what was not filled in, just in case something was forgotten:<br /><ul>";
651  }
652  else
653  {
654  dep_message = "Some setup steps have not been completed. Please fix the required steps (printed in bold), "
655  "otherwise the setup cannot be completed:<br /><ul>";
656  }
657 
658  for (int i = 0; i < dependencies.size(); ++i)
659  {
660  dep_message.append("<li>").append(dependencies.at(i)).append("</li>");
661  }
662 
663  if (!required_actions)
664  {
665  dep_message.append("</ul><br/>Press Ok to continue generating files.");
666  if (QMessageBox::question(this, "Incomplete MoveIt Setup Assistant Steps", dep_message,
667  QMessageBox::Ok | QMessageBox::Cancel) == QMessageBox::Cancel)
668  {
669  return false; // abort
670  }
671  }
672  else
673  {
674  QMessageBox::warning(this, "Incomplete MoveIt Setup Assistant Steps", dep_message);
675  return false;
676  }
677  }
678 
679  return true;
680 }
681 
682 // ******************************************************************************************
683 // A function for showing progress and user feedback about what happened
684 // ******************************************************************************************
685 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::updateProgress()
686 {
687  action_num_++;
688 
689  // Calc percentage
690  progress_bar_->setValue(double(action_num_) / gen_files_.size() * 100);
691 
692  // allow the progress bar to be shown
693  QApplication::processEvents();
694 }
695 
696 // ******************************************************************************************
697 // Display the selected action in the desc box
698 // ******************************************************************************************
699 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::changeActionDesc(int id)
700 {
701  // Only allow event if list is not empty
702  if (id >= 0)
703  {
704  // Show the selected text
705  action_label_->setText(action_desc_.at(id));
706  }
707 }
708 
709 // ******************************************************************************************
710 // Disable or enable item in gen_files_ array
711 // ******************************************************************************************
712 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::changeCheckedState(QListWidgetItem* item)
713 {
714  std::size_t index = item->data(Qt::UserRole).toUInt();
715  bool generate = (item->checkState() == Qt::Checked);
716 
717  if (!generate && (gen_files_[index].write_on_changes & config_data_->changes))
718  {
719  QMessageBox::warning(this, "Package Generation",
720  "You should generate this file to ensure your changes will take "
721  "effect.");
722  }
723 
724  // Enable/disable file
725  gen_files_[index].generate_ = generate;
726 }
727 
728 // ******************************************************************************************
729 // Called when setup assistant navigation switches to this screen
730 // ******************************************************************************************
731 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::focusGiven()
732 {
733  if (first_focusGiven_)
734  {
735  // only generate list once
736  first_focusGiven_ = false;
737 
738  // Load this list of all files to be generated
739  loadGenFiles();
740  }
741 
742  // Which files have been modified outside the Setup Assistant?
743  bool files_already_modified = checkGenFiles();
744 
745  // disable reaction to checkbox changes
746  disconnect(action_list_, SIGNAL(itemChanged(QListWidgetItem*)), this, SLOT(changeCheckedState(QListWidgetItem*)));
747 
748  // Show files in GUI
749  bool have_conflicting_changes = showGenFiles();
750 
751  // react to manual changes only (not programmatic ones)
752  connect(action_list_, SIGNAL(itemChanged(QListWidgetItem*)), this, SLOT(changeCheckedState(QListWidgetItem*)));
753 
754  // Allow list box to populate
755  QApplication::processEvents();
756 
757  if (files_already_modified)
758  {
759  // Some were found to be modified
760  QString msg("Some files have been modified outside of the Setup Assistant (according to timestamp). "
761  "The Setup Assistant will not overwrite these changes by default because often changing configuration "
762  "files manually is necessary, "
763  "but we recommend you check the list and enable the checkbox next to files you would like to "
764  "overwrite. ");
765  if (have_conflicting_changes)
766  msg += "<br/><font color='red'>Attention:</font> Some files (<font color='red'>marked red</font>) are changed "
767  "both, externally and in Setup Assistant.";
768  QMessageBox::information(this, "Files Modified", msg);
769  }
770 }
771 
772 // ******************************************************************************************
773 // Check the list of files to be generated for modification
774 // Returns true if files were detected as modified
775 // ******************************************************************************************
776 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::checkGenFiles()
777 {
778  // Check if we are 'editing' a prev generated config pkg
779  if (config_data_->config_pkg_path_.empty())
780  return false; // this is a new package
781 
782  // Check if we have the previous modification timestamp to compare agains
783  if (config_data_->config_pkg_generated_timestamp_ == 0)
784  return false; // this package has not been generated with a timestamp, backwards compatible.
785 
786  static const std::time_t TIME_MOD_TOLERANCE = 10;
787 
788  // Check all old file's modification time
789  bool found_modified = false;
790  for (GenerateFile& gen_file : gen_files_)
791  {
792  GenerateFile* file = &gen_file;
793 
794  fs::path file_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->config_pkg_path_, file->rel_path_);
795 
796  // Don't disable folders from being generated
797  if (fs::is_directory(file_path))
798  continue;
799 
800  if (fs::is_regular_file(file_path))
801  {
802  std::time_t mod_time = fs::last_write_time(file_path);
803 
804  // ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("File " << file->file_name_ << " file modified " << mod_time << " pkg modified " <<
805  // config_data_->config_pkg_generated_timestamp_);
806 
807  if (mod_time > config_data_->config_pkg_generated_timestamp_ + TIME_MOD_TOLERANCE ||
808  mod_time < config_data_->config_pkg_generated_timestamp_ - TIME_MOD_TOLERANCE)
809  {
810  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Manual editing detected: not over-writing by default file " << file->file_name_);
811 
812  if (file->write_on_changes & config_data_->changes)
813  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Editing in Setup Assistant conflicts with external editing of file " << file->file_name_);
814 
815  file->generate_ = false; // do not overwrite by default
816  file->modified_ = true;
817  found_modified = true;
818  }
819  else
820  {
821  file->modified_ = false;
822  }
823  }
824  }
825 
826  // Warn user if files have been modified outside Setup Assistant
827  return found_modified;
828 }
829 
830 // ******************************************************************************************
831 // Show the list of files to be generated
832 // ******************************************************************************************
833 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::showGenFiles()
834 {
835  bool have_conflicting_changes = false;
836  action_list_->clear();
837 
838  // Display this list in the GUI
839  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < gen_files_.size(); ++i)
840  {
841  GenerateFile* file = &gen_files_[i];
842 
843  // Create a formatted row
844  QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(QString(file->rel_path_.c_str()), action_list_, 0);
845 
846  fs::path file_path = config_data_->appendPaths(config_data_->config_pkg_path_, file->rel_path_);
847 
848  // Checkbox
849  item->setCheckState(file->generate_ ? Qt::Checked : Qt::Unchecked);
850  // externally modified?
851  if (file->modified_)
852  {
853  if (file->write_on_changes & config_data_->changes)
854  {
855  have_conflicting_changes = true;
856  item->setForeground(QBrush(QColor(255, 0, 0)));
857  }
858  else
859  item->setForeground(QBrush(QColor(255, 135, 0)));
860  }
861 
862  // Don't allow folders to be disabled
863  if (fs::is_directory(file_path))
864  {
865  item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsSelectable | Qt::ItemIsEnabled);
866  }
867 
868  // Link the gen_files_ index to this item
869  item->setData(Qt::UserRole, QVariant(static_cast<qulonglong>(i)));
870 
871  // Add actions to list
872  action_list_->addItem(item);
873  action_desc_.append(QString(file->description_.c_str()));
874  }
875 
876  // Select the first item in the list so that a description is visible
877  action_list_->setCurrentRow(0);
878  return have_conflicting_changes;
879 }
880 
881 // ******************************************************************************************
882 // Save configuration click event
883 // ******************************************************************************************
884 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::savePackage()
885 {
886  // Feedback
887  success_label_->hide();
888 
889  // Reset the progress bar counter and GUI stuff
890  action_num_ = 0;
891  progress_bar_->setValue(0);
892 
893  if (!generatePackage())
894  {
895  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Failed to generate entire configuration package");
896  return;
897  }
898 
899  // Alert user it completed successfully --------------------------------------------------
900  progress_bar_->setValue(100);
901  success_label_->show();
902  has_generated_pkg_ = true;
903 }
904 
905 // ******************************************************************************************
906 // Save package using default path
907 // ******************************************************************************************
908 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::generatePackage()
909 {
910  // Get path name
911  std::string new_package_path = stack_path_->getPath();
912 
913  // Check that a valid stack package name has been given
914  if (new_package_path.empty())
915  {
916  QMessageBox::warning(this, "Error Generating",
917  "No package path provided. Please choose a directory location to "
918  "generate the MoveIt configuration files.");
919  return false;
920  }
921 
922  // Check setup assist deps
923  if (!checkDependencies())
924  return false; // canceled
925 
926  // Check that all groups have components
927  if (!noGroupsEmpty())
928  return false; // not ready
929 
930  // Trim whitespace from user input
931  boost::trim(new_package_path);
932 
933  // Get the package name ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
934  new_package_name_ = getPackageName(new_package_path);
935 
936  const std::string setup_assistant_file = config_data_->appendPaths(new_package_path, SETUP_ASSISTANT_FILE);
937 
938  // Make sure old package is correct package type and verify over write
939  if (fs::is_directory(new_package_path) && !fs::is_empty(new_package_path))
940  {
941  // Check if the old package is a setup assistant package. If it is not, quit
942  if (!fs::is_regular_file(setup_assistant_file))
943  {
944  QMessageBox::warning(
945  this, "Incorrect Folder/Package",
946  QString("The chosen package location already exists but was not previously created using this MoveIt Setup "
947  "Assistant. "
948  "If this is a mistake, add the missing file: ")
949  .append(setup_assistant_file.c_str()));
950  return false;
951  }
952 
953  // Confirm overwrite
954  if (QMessageBox::question(this, "Confirm Package Update",
955  QString("Are you sure you want to overwrite this existing package with updated "
956  "configurations?<br /><i>")
957  .append(new_package_path.c_str())
958  .append("</i>"),
959  QMessageBox::Ok | QMessageBox::Cancel) == QMessageBox::Cancel)
960  {
961  return false; // abort
962  }
963  }
964  else // this is a new package (but maybe the folder already exists)
965  {
966  // Create new directory ------------------------------------------------------------------
967  try
968  {
969  fs::create_directory(new_package_path) && !fs::is_directory(new_package_path);
970  }
971  catch (...)
972  {
973  QMessageBox::critical(this, "Error Generating Files",
974  QString("Unable to create directory ").append(new_package_path.c_str()));
975  return false;
976  }
977  }
978 
979  // Begin to create files and folders ----------------------------------------------------------------------
980  std::string absolute_path;
981 
982  for (GenerateFile& gen_file : gen_files_)
983  {
984  GenerateFile* file = &gen_file;
985 
986  // Check if we should skip this file
987  if (!file->generate_)
988  {
989  continue;
990  }
991 
992  // Create the absolute path
993  absolute_path = config_data_->appendPaths(new_package_path, file->rel_path_);
994  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Creating file " << absolute_path);
995 
996  // Clear template strings in case export is run multiple times with changes in between
997  template_strings_.clear();
998 
999  // Run the generate function
1000  if (!file->gen_func_(absolute_path))
1001  {
1002  // Error occured
1003  QMessageBox::critical(this, "Error Generating File",
1004  QString("Failed to generate folder or file: '")
1005  .append(file->rel_path_.c_str())
1006  .append("' at location:\n")
1007  .append(absolute_path.c_str()));
1008  return false;
1009  }
1010  updateProgress(); // Increment and update GUI
1011  }
1012 
1013  return true;
1014 }
1015 
1016 // ******************************************************************************************
1017 // Quit the program because we are done
1018 // ******************************************************************************************
1019 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::exitSetupAssistant()
1020 {
1021  if (has_generated_pkg_ || QMessageBox::question(this, "Exit Setup Assistant",
1022  QString("Are you sure you want to exit the MoveIt Setup Assistant?"),
1023  QMessageBox::Ok | QMessageBox::Cancel) == QMessageBox::Ok)
1024  {
1025  QApplication::quit();
1026  }
1027 }
1028 
1029 // ******************************************************************************************
1030 // Get the last folder name in a directory path
1031 // ******************************************************************************************
1032 const std::string ConfigurationFilesWidget::getPackageName(std::string package_path)
1033 {
1034  // Remove end slash if there is one
1035  if (!package_path.compare(package_path.size() - 1, 1, "/"))
1036  {
1037  package_path = package_path.substr(0, package_path.size() - 1);
1038  }
1039 
1040  // Get the last directory name
1041  std::string package_name;
1042  fs::path fs_package_path = package_path;
1043 
1044  package_name = fs_package_path.filename().string();
1045 
1046  // check for empty
1047  if (package_name.empty())
1048  package_name = "unknown";
1049 
1050  return package_name;
1051 }
1052 
1053 // ******************************************************************************************
1054 // Check that no group is empty (without links/joints/etc)
1055 // ******************************************************************************************
1056 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::noGroupsEmpty()
1057 {
1058  // Loop through all groups
1059  for (const auto& group : config_data_->srdf_->groups_)
1060  {
1061  // Whenever 1 of the 4 component types are found, stop checking this group
1062  if (!group.joints_.empty())
1063  continue;
1064  if (!group.links_.empty())
1065  continue;
1066  if (!group.chains_.empty())
1067  continue;
1068  if (!group.subgroups_.empty())
1069  continue;
1070 
1071  // This group has no contents, bad
1072  QMessageBox::warning(
1073  this, "Empty Group",
1074  QString("The planning group '")
1075  .append(group.name_.c_str())
1076  .append("' is empty and has no subcomponents associated with it (joints/links/chains/subgroups). You must "
1077  "edit or remove this planning group before this configuration package can be saved."));
1078  return false;
1079  }
1080 
1081  return true; // good
1082 }
1083 
1084 // ******************************************************************************************
1085 // Load the strings that will be replaced in all templates
1086 // ******************************************************************************************
1087 void ConfigurationFilesWidget::loadTemplateStrings()
1088 {
1089  // Pair 1
1090  addTemplateString("[GENERATED_PACKAGE_NAME]", new_package_name_);
1091 
1092  // Pair 2
1093  std::string urdf_location = config_data_->urdf_pkg_name_.empty() ? config_data_->urdf_path_ :
1094  "$(find " + config_data_->urdf_pkg_name_ + ")/" +
1095  config_data_->urdf_pkg_relative_path_;
1096  addTemplateString("[URDF_LOCATION]", urdf_location);
1097 
1098  // Pair 3
1099  if (config_data_->urdf_from_xacro_)
1100  addTemplateString("[URDF_LOAD_ATTRIBUTE]",
1101  "command=\"xacro " + config_data_->xacro_args_ + " '" + urdf_location + "'\"");
1102  else
1103  addTemplateString("[URDF_LOAD_ATTRIBUTE]", "textfile=\"" + urdf_location + "\"");
1104 
1105  // Pair 4
1106  addTemplateString("[ROBOT_NAME]", config_data_->srdf_->robot_name_);
1107 
1108  // Pair 5
1109  addTemplateString("[ROBOT_ROOT_LINK]", config_data_->getRobotModel()->getRootLinkName());
1110 
1111  // Pair 6
1112  addTemplateString("[PLANNING_FRAME]", config_data_->getRobotModel()->getModelFrame());
1113 
1114  // Pair 7
1115  std::stringstream vjb;
1116  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < config_data_->srdf_->virtual_joints_.size(); ++i)
1117  {
1118  const srdf::Model::VirtualJoint& vj = config_data_->srdf_->virtual_joints_[i];
1119  vjb << " <node pkg=\"tf2_ros\" type=\"static_transform_publisher\" name=\"virtual_joint_broadcaster_" << i
1120  << "\" args=\"0 0 0 0 0 0 " << vj.parent_frame_ << " " << vj.child_link_ << "\" />" << std::endl;
1121  }
1122  addTemplateString("[VIRTUAL_JOINT_BROADCASTER]", vjb.str());
1123 
1124  // Pair 8 - Add dependencies to package.xml if the robot.urdf file is relative to a ROS package
1125  if (config_data_->urdf_pkg_name_.empty())
1126  {
1127  addTemplateString("[OTHER_DEPENDENCIES", ""); // not relative to a ROS package
1128  }
1129  else
1130  {
1131  std::stringstream deps;
1132  deps << " <run_depend>" << config_data_->urdf_pkg_name_ << "</run_depend>\n";
1133  addTemplateString("[OTHER_DEPENDENCIES]", deps.str()); // not relative to a ROS package
1134  }
1135 
1136  // Pair 9 - Add ROS Controllers to ros_controllers.launch file
1137  if (config_data_->getROSControllers().empty())
1138  {
1139  addTemplateString("[ROS_CONTROLLERS]", "");
1140  }
1141  else
1142  {
1143  std::stringstream controllers;
1144  for (ROSControlConfig& controller : config_data_->getROSControllers())
1145  {
1146  // Check if the controller belongs to controller_list namespace
1147  if (controller.type_ != "FollowJointTrajectory")
1148  controllers << controller.name_ << " ";
1149  }
1150  addTemplateString("[ROS_CONTROLLERS]", controllers.str());
1151  }
1152 
1153  // Pair 10 - Add parameter files for the kinematics solvers that should be loaded
1154  // in addition to kinematics.yaml by planning_context.launch
1155  std::string kinematics_parameters_files_block;
1156  for (const auto& groups : config_data_->group_meta_data_)
1157  {
1158  if (groups.second.kinematics_parameters_file_.empty())
1159  continue;
1160 
1161  // add a linebreak if we have more than one entry
1162  if (!kinematics_parameters_files_block.empty())
1163  kinematics_parameters_files_block += "\n";
1164 
1165  std::string line = " <rosparam command=\"load\" ns=\"" + groups.first + "\" file=\"" +
1166  groups.second.kinematics_parameters_file_ + "\"/>";
1167  kinematics_parameters_files_block += line;
1168  }
1169  addTemplateString("[KINEMATICS_PARAMETERS_FILE_NAMES_BLOCK]", kinematics_parameters_files_block);
1170 
1171  addTemplateString("[AUTHOR_NAME]", config_data_->author_name_);
1172  addTemplateString("[AUTHOR_EMAIL]", config_data_->author_email_);
1173 }
1174 
1175 // ******************************************************************************************
1176 // Insert a string pair into the template_strings_ datastructure
1177 // ******************************************************************************************
1178 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::addTemplateString(const std::string& key, const std::string& value)
1179 {
1180  template_strings_.push_back(std::pair<std::string, std::string>(key, value));
1181 
1182  return true;
1183 }
1184 
1185 // ******************************************************************************************
1186 // Copy a template from location <template_path> to location <output_path> and replace package name
1187 // ******************************************************************************************
1188 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::copyTemplate(const std::string& template_path, const std::string& output_path)
1189 {
1190  // Check if template strings have been loaded yet
1191  if (template_strings_.empty())
1192  {
1193  loadTemplateStrings();
1194  }
1195 
1196  // Error check file
1197  if (!fs::is_regular_file(template_path))
1198  {
1199  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unable to find template file " << template_path);
1200  return false;
1201  }
1202 
1203  // Load file
1204  std::ifstream template_stream(template_path.c_str());
1205  if (!template_stream.good()) // File not found
1206  {
1207  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unable to load file " << template_path);
1208  return false;
1209  }
1210 
1211  // Load the file to a string using an efficient memory allocation technique
1212  std::string template_string;
1213  template_stream.seekg(0, std::ios::end);
1214  template_string.reserve(template_stream.tellg());
1215  template_stream.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
1216  template_string.assign((std::istreambuf_iterator<char>(template_stream)), std::istreambuf_iterator<char>());
1217  template_stream.close();
1218 
1219  // Replace keywords in string ------------------------------------------------------------
1220  for (std::pair<std::string, std::string>& it : template_strings_)
1221  {
1222  boost::replace_all(template_string, it.first, it.second);
1223  }
1224 
1225  // Save string to new location -----------------------------------------------------------
1226  std::ofstream output_stream(output_path.c_str(), std::ios_base::trunc);
1227  if (!output_stream.good())
1228  {
1229  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Unable to open file for writing " << output_path);
1230  return false;
1231  }
1232 
1233  output_stream << template_string.c_str();
1234  output_stream.close();
1235 
1236  return true; // file created successfully
1237 }
1238 
1239 // ******************************************************************************************
1240 // Create a folder
1241 // ******************************************************************************************
1242 bool ConfigurationFilesWidget::createFolder(const std::string& output_path)
1243 {
1244  if (!fs::is_directory(output_path))
1245  {
1246  if (!fs::create_directory(output_path))
1247  {
1248  QMessageBox::critical(this, "Error Generating Files",
1249  QString("Unable to create directory ").append(output_path.c_str()));
1250  return false;
1251  }
1252  }
1253  return true;
1254 }
